author: danielf
msg: Changed configuration to make the bundle: protocol (corresponds to resource:) available. It decreases security as bundle can read each other, it was needed to make my BlockManager test code pass the first exception, but there are more :/ Next is a subtle class loading exception.
Also exported one more package and set some properties.

msg: Explain this sandbox for inquiring minds

msg: setup for using entity references in all projects to centralize version on dependency references
